sentences.sContent: In the end, sexuality includes physical intimacy and affectional intimacy.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the end, sexuality includes physical intimacy and affectional intimacy.
sentences.sCn: 最后，性既包括肉体上的亲密，也包含着情感上的亲密。

sentences.sContent: The bonds of marriage and family life are no longer functional, but affectional.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bonds of marriage and family life are no longer functional, but affectional.
sentences.sCn: 婚姻和家庭生活的纽带不再是功能性的，而是情感性的了。

words.tran: 受到影响的；做作的；假装的
令人感动地；令人伤心地
影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）
